task_description:
# API field name mismatch - Project creation

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-13](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-13/api-field-name-mismatch-project-creation)
**Priority:** Urgent
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
Frontend sends wrong field names to backend API for project creation.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx (line 68-70)

**Current Code:**

```typescript
location: formData.address,
expectedEndDate: formData.estimatedEndDate
```

**Backend Expects:**

* address (not location)
* estimated_end_date (snake_case)

**Fix Required:**

* Update API call to use correct field names
* Or update backend to accept aliases

**Priority:** High
